com.lukflug.panelstudio.container

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer<IFixedComponent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HUDGUI

    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContainer<IFixedComponent>
    Object representing the entire GUI. All components should be a direct or indirect child of this object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FixedContainer container
      Container containing all components.
      protected IPopupPositioner descriptionPosition
      The IPopupPositioner to be used to position the descriptions.
      protected IDescriptionRenderer descriptionRenderer
      The IDescriptionRenderer to be used by the GUI.
      protected IInterface inter
      The IInterface to be used by the GUI.
